entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of wet flurries overnight. Risk of thunderstorms near the mountains early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:51 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 9. POP 60%
